TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCell extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的儲存格。

span.span: Represents a cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 類別代表的資料格中控制項。The class represents a cell in a control. 您可以使用屬性來指定，或決定資料格的內容。You can use the property to specify or determine the contents of the cell. 類別可讓您控制的儲存格內容的顯示方式。The class allows you to control how the contents of the cell are displayed. 設定所指定的儲存格內容的對齊方式和屬性。The alignment of the contents in the cell are specified by setting the and properties. 您可以使用屬性，以指定的儲存格的儲存格內容是否換行。You can use the property to specify whether the contents of the cell wrap in the cell. 您也可以指定多少資料列或資料行，在資料表中，由控制項，佔用個別資料格。You can also specify how many rows or columns in the table, represented by a control, are occupied by an individual cell. 和屬性會控制多少資料列和資料行使用，分別。The and properties control how many rows and columns are used, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立資料表，以程式設計的方式，將項目加入至資料表，並顯示在網頁上的資料表。The following code example demonstrates how to create a table, add elements to the table programmatically, and display the table on the Web page. 請注意如何控制項具現化，並設定其屬性值。Note how controls are instantiated and their property values are set. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將 控制項的特定屬性加入要呈現的屬性清單中。

span.span: Adds properties specific to the control to the list of attributes to render.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底類別的方法及第一個呼叫的基底方法，並將屬性對應至屬性，屬性和屬性。The method overrides the base class's method and first calls the base method and then adds the attributes corresponding to the property, the property and the property. 如果屬性參考到，找不到，就會擲回。If the property refers to a that can not be found, an is thrown. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便自訂 title 屬性會呈現每個資料格。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a custom title attribute is rendered for each cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTableCellAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_tablecell_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

span.span: A cell listed as an associated header cell was not found.

span.para: 覆寫時方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓控制項屬性會正確轉譯。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that the control attributes are properly rendered.

summary.span: 將已剖析的子控制項加入至 控制項。

span.span: Adds a parsed child control to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項包含子控制項，則基底類別的方法是呼叫，否則控制項的屬性值會成為物件控制項的.If the control contains child controls then the base class's method is called; otherwise, the control's property value is added as a object to the control's . 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.para: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使物件會適當地加入至控制項。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that objects are properly added to the control .

summary.span: 取得或設定與 控制項關聯之資料表標題儲存格的空格分隔清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a space-separated list of table header cells associated with the control.

value.span: 字串的陣列，內含關聯資料表標題儲存格的識別項。

span.span: An array of strings containing the identifiers of the associated table header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的標頭資料格程式設計識別項提供的標頭資訊清單控制項。The property contains a list of header cell programmatic identifiers that provide header information of the control. 標頭資料格識別碼的清單為逗號分隔清單轉譯為 HTML``項目的`header`屬性。The list of header cell identifiers is rendered as a comma delimited list into the HTML `` element's `header` attribute. 設定時屬性使用逗號分隔清單的字串。When setting the property use a comma delimited list of strings. 如果清單的項目無法辨識為有效的資料表標頭資料格時擲回叫用。If an element of the list is not recognized as a valid table header cell an is thrown when the is invoked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the property of a control. 特別是，請注意最後一個資料列中的資料格的三個標頭儲存格相關聯的方式。In particular, note how the cell in the last row is associated to three header cells. 如需完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中儲存格所跨的行數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the control that the cell spans.

value.span: 所呈現的資料表中儲存格所跨的行數。

span.span: The number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定資料格所跨越之呈現資料表中的資料行數目。Use the property to specify or determine the number of columns in the rendered table that the cell spans. 例如，如果您將此屬性設定為`2`，會佔用兩個資料行中的資料格控制項。For example, if you set this property to `2`, the cell takes up two columns in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the of a control. 特別是，請注意如何最後一個資料列的單一資料格所跨越三個資料行。In particular, note how the last row's single cell spans three columns. 如需完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的儲存格內容的水平對齊。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the contents of the cell. 使用的可能值中指定列舉型別。The possible values for use are specified in the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式指定屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify the property of a control. 特別是，請注意如何中最後一個資料列的資料格是靠左對齊。In particular, note how the cell in the last row is left justified. 如需完整的工作的程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. ```csharp (2,0) ``` ```vb (2,0) ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項具有子控制項或中覆寫衍生類別的基底類別方法是呼叫; 否則值屬性寫入物件。If the control has child controls or is overridden in a derived class the base class's method is called; otherwise, the value of the property is written to the object. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中自訂方法控制的其儲存格的內容插入自訂文字。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it custom text is inserted in the cell's contents. summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格的文字內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text contents of the cell.
The text contents of the cell.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定資料格的文字內容。Use the property to specify or determine the text contents of the cell. 這個屬性通常用於以程式設計方式更新資料格的內容。This property is commonly used to programmatically update the contents of a cell. > [!NOTE] > 設定屬性將會清除任何其他所包含的控制項。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the . > [!CAUTION] > 控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體以程式設計方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of a control programmatically. 特別是，請注意如何屬性用來設定的內容控制項。In particular, note how the property is used for setting the contents of the control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[TableCell#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[TableCell#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign VerticalAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign VerticalAlign
Public Overridable Property VerticalAlign As VerticalAlign
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::VerticalAlign VerticalAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::VerticalAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::VerticalAlign value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格中內容的垂直對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents in the cell.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的儲存格內容的垂直對齊方式。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents of the cell. 使用的可能值中指定列舉型別。The possible values for use are specified in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Wrap { get; set; }
.property instance bool Wrap
Public Overridable Property Wrap As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Wrap : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出儲存格的內容是否換行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicating whether the contents of the cell wrap.

value.span: 如果儲存格內容在儲存格中換行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the contents of the cell wrap in the cell; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定資料格內容是否換行的儲存格。Use the property to specify or determine whether the content of the cell wrap in the cell.
